data.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Infantry (EDF3), Storm 1 Colors & Special Gear
data.detailed_description: This allows you to play as an EDF3 Infantry using the colors of Storm 1, the legendary soldier who was the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 2017" and "Earth Defense Force 2017 Portable," equipped with a special weapon. Those who enlisted early can use this to fight while feeling like a legend. Now, go and save our Earth!
data.about_the_game: This allows you to play as an EDF3 Infantry using the colors of Storm 1, the legendary soldier who was the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 2017" and "Earth Defense Force 2017 Portable," equipped with a special weapon. Those who enlisted early can use this to fight while feeling like a legend. Now, go and save our Earth!
data.short_description: This allows you to play as an EDF3 Infantry using the colors of Storm 1, the legendary soldier who was the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 2017" and "Earth Defense Force 2017 Portable," equipped with a special weapon.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
  • Additional Notes: XInput Controller
